description:
Quickly combine multiple photos into one beautifully framed picture.

Pic Stitch packs a simple design with a powerful editor to give you everything you could possibly want to make your photo's simply amazing.

Share your masterpiece on your favorite social media networks including Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. Or order prints from your local Walgreens for in-store pickup.

Use Pic Stitch to create a before-and-after sequence, combine great photos of each of your kids, or produce a photographic series.

*  Features  *
- Up to 232 different layouts
- 15 different photo aspect ratios (1x1, 4x6, 3x4, 5x7, 9x16, etc)
- Order prints to be picked up at Walgreens in about an hour with QuickPrints.
- Export to Instagram, Dropbox, Evernote or any other installed application that will accept JPEG images.
- Customize photo borders (Borders Add-On Pack only)
- Easy to use UI
- Amazing photo fx filters
- Pan, rotate, flip, mirror and zoom
- Share onto Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Path and More
- Save to photo album
- Share via email
- High resolution export
- iPhone, iPad, iPad Mini and iPod Touch
- iPhone 5s and 5c compatibility
- iOS7 compatibility
releaseNotes:
- iOS 8 Compatibility
- New Border Shadow option available as part of the Borders Pack
